section.name: Maven Site Indexer plugin
section.p: An easy way to index your maven site and give it a nice ajax search box.

ul.li: mvn site:site index:index (don't site-deploy it, as it overvwrites the added tags - still working on this :P)
open up your site and enjoy your nice and free search box!

section.p: Wanna see an example? Look at the top right corner of this page ;)
